resource.name: resource

options.name: Company
options.description: Company API lets you lookup company data via a domain name or company name

options.name: Person
options.description: Person API lets you lookup a person based on an email address OR based on a domain name + first name + last name

resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

company.name: company
company.description: The name of the company (e.g – amazon)
company.ai_hint: The name of the company (e.g – amazon)

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.description: First name of the person (e.g – Marc)
firstname.ai_hint: First name of the person (e.g – Marc)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: Last name of the person (e.g – Benioff)
lastname.ai_hint: Last name of the person (e.g – Benioff)

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'company'
IF resource == 'company' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstname'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastname'
IF resource == 'person' AND operation == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
